Tests how DOMDebugger reports event listeners for nodes.

  useCapture:true
  lineNumber:3
  columnNumber:33
  handler.type:function
  handler.className:Function
  handler.description:function clickHandler(event) { console.log('click - button - bubbling (registered before attribute)'); }

  columnNumber:66

  handler.description:function hoverHandler(event) { console.log("hover - button - bubbling"); }
